IncidentDef.label: mudcrab merchant meeting
IncidentDef.letterText: {0} has stumbled upon a peculiar mudcrab surrounded by several empty bottles of sujamma. The mudcrab scuttles over to a collection of crates, several of which are filled with silver, the rest with more alcohol. It seems the mudcrab wishes to trade with you.

IncidentDef.label: scrib merchant meeting
IncidentDef.letterText: {0} has stumbled upon a peculiar scrib surrounded by several empty bottles of skooma. The scrib begins to excitedly thump the ground, and then scuttles over to a collection of crates, some filled with rare volcanic glass, the rest overflowing with kwama eggs. It seems the scrib wishes to trade with you.
